item.title: About me
item.author: frodsan@me.com (Francesco Rodr√≠guez)
item.description: Hi! My name is Francesco Rodr√≠guez. I’m a software developer living in Oslo. I moved here from Peru (where I’m from) in 2016. I love code, video games, books, my üê∂ and ‚öΩ. I currently work at Hyper as a Full-Stack Developer making web applications using my favorite stack: Ruby on Rails, Postgres, Redis and Heroku. You can read more about that in my resume. On my spare time, I’ve been playing with Go, Python and Machine Learning.
